content: make your own crochet thistle with my easy step by step written tutorial the symbol of scotland you can make your crochet thistle as a brooch or add it to a collection of flowers for contrast crochet pattern includes step by step written / photo instructions showing you how to easily make your own crochet thistle stems in a few steps make crochet flowers with any yarn from your stash & the matching crochet hook a quick easy pattern ideal for every crocheter detailed pdf pattern written line by line in english with photos along the way to help you pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size the pattern is written in us terms and includes conversion table in uk terms step by step tutorial with written instructions & additional photos made to craft yarn council standards skill level easy if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moara crochet © if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
